titles.title: A bill to designate a mountain peak in the State of Montana as "Alex Diekmann Peak".
Alex Diekmann Peak Designation Act of 2016
Alex Diekmann Peak Designation Act of 2016

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 114-509.

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

bill.summary:
Alex Diekmann Peak Designation Act of 2016
This bill designates as the Alex Diekmann Peak the 9,765-foot peak located 2.2 miles west-northwest of Finger Mountain on the western boundary of the Lee Metcalf Wilderness in Montana.
